course_description: An intro to the theory and craft of dramatic screenwriting of the short film. Explores how a short script is developed from concept to final written form. Class includes lectures, film viewing, and exercises but is primarily a workshop where new writing receives weekly table reads and feedback.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or  FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
